## 1. Overview

*Brief high-level description of the feature (the **What**) and an explanation of the problem it solves or the value it provides (the **Why**).*

## 2. Objectives

*Measurable outcomes and functional requirements that this epic aims to achieve.*

## 3. Out-of-scope

*Out-of-scope objectives to prevent scope creep. These should relate directly to the context of the epic and could be part of it but are intentionally excluded for various reasons.*

*Any technical, budgetary, or time limitations that must be considered during development.*

*Any external requirements, third-party services, or other epics that need to be completed before this epic can progress.*
